message.content:
{"id": "11863", 
"title": "Update Test Suite action does not allow removal", 
"description": "When attempting to update a test suite using the action menu, it is not clear that selecting 'Yes' in the confirmation dialog will result in the removal of test suite X.", 
"OB": "The current behavior of the Update Test Suite action does not allow for the removal of test suites.", 
"EB": "The Update Test Suite action should provide an option to remove test suites when updating.", 
"SR": "Modify the Update Test Suite action to include a clear option for removing test suites during the update process." 
}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': "Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove It is no clear that if I onlyselect Y in the dialog that I'll end up with X being removed. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
